mapper.select: SELECT * from ELECEVERYHOURDATA where PLACETYPE = #{PLACETYPE} and PLACE = #{PLACE} and DATADATE = #{DATADATE}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ELECEVERYHOURDATA (PLACETYPE, PLACE, TOTALNUM, DATADATE, CREATEDATE) VALUES (#{PLACETYPE},#{PLACE},#{TOTALNUM},#{DATADATE},sysdate)
mapper.update: UPDATE ELECEVERYHOURDATA SET TOTALNUM = #{TOTALNUM} , CREATEDATE = sysdate WHERE PLACETYPE = #{PLACETYPE} and PLACE = #{PLACE} and DATADATE = #{DATADATE}
mapper.select: SELECT sum(TOTALNUM) as totalNum, TO_CHAR(DATADATE,'mm/dd') as dataDate FROM ELECEVERYHOURDATA WHERE TO_CHAR(DATADATE,'mm/dd')=TO_CHAR(sysdate,'mm/dd') GROUP BY TO_CHAR(DATADATE,'mm/dd')
SELECT sum(TOTALNUM) as totalNum, TO_CHAR(DATADATE,'MM')||'月' as dataDate FROM ELECEVERYHOURDATA WHERE TO_CHAR(DATADATE,'mm')=TO_CHAR(sysdate,'mm') GROUP BY TO_CHAR(DATADATE,'MM')||'月'
